events.comment: Iniciar temporizadores y variables de escena

parameters:
"Wave " + ToString(Variable(current_wave_index) + 1)
    + " | Path: " + VariableString(wave_json.waves[current_wave_index].path)
    + " | Count: " + ToString(Variable(wave_json.waves[current_wave_index].count)) 
    + " | WaveInProgress: " + ToString(Variable(wave_in_progress)) 
 + " | TotalWaves: " + ToString(VariableChildCount(wave_json.waves))

"item1 " + ToString(GlobalVariable(item1_collected))
    + " | item2: " + 
ToString(GlobalVariable(item2_collected))
+ " | item3: " + 
ToString(GlobalVariable(item3_collected))
+ " | key_item_exists: " + ToString(Variable(key_item_exists))
